dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
This package provides semi-portable access to hardware-provided atomic
memory update operations on a number architectures.
dependencies.name: libatomic-ops

dependent_to.description:
Guile is the GNU Ubiquitous Intelligent Language for Extensions, the
official extension language for the GNU operating system.
dependent_to.name: guile

dependent_to.description: "The extensible editor for structured binary data
dependent_to.name: poke

dependent_to.description:
w3m is a text-based web browser as well as a pager like `more' or
`less'. With w3m you can browse web pages through a terminal emulator
window (xterm, rxvt or something like that). Moreover, w3m can be used
as a text formatting tool which typesets HTML into plain text.
dependent_to.name: w3m

description:
The Boehm-Demers-Weiser conservative garbage collector is a garbage
collecting replacement for C malloc or C++ new.
name: bdw-gc

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
